p: Mother cultures of each bacteria were set up 24 h before the assays in order to reach the stationary phase of growth. The tests were assessed by inoculating from the mother cultures Petri disks with proper sterile media with the aim of obtaining the microorganisms concentration 10 6 CFU/mL. For bacteria, aliquots of dimethylsulfoxide (DMSO) were added to the essential oils in order to obtain a 0.05â€“500.0 mg/mL concentration range and then deposited on sterile paper disk (6 mm diameter, Becton Dickinson Italia S.p.A., Milan, Italy).
